channel.title: Rapture! For real!
channel.description:
[url='https://www.thevenusproject.com/the-venus-project-introduction/about']There's a project I noticed while sifting through Google,[/url] about something that seems eerily similar to Rapture from the game Bio Shock... Will it fail? Succeed? Discuss. :retard: [QUOTE= The Venus Project] The Venus Project is an organization that proposes a feasible plan of action for social change, one that works towards a peaceful and sustainable global civilization. It outlines an alternative to strive toward where human rights are no longer paper proclamations but a way of life.
We operate out of a 21.5-acre Research Center located in Venus, Florida.
When one considers the enormity of the challenges facing society today, we can safely conclude that the time is long overdue for us to reexamine our values, and to reflect upon and evaluate some of the underlying issues and assumptions we have as a society. This self-analysis calls into question the very nature of what it means to be human, what it means to be a member of a "civilization," and what choices we can make today to ensure a prosperous future for all the world's people. [/QUOTE] Obviously it's not under the ocean or anything, but the principles are... Familiar, to put it one way.

item.title: Rapture! For real!
item.dc:creator: mattemuse
item.description:
I’m pretty sure that when I typed “you and Medivaelle” I actually meant only you. So yes, that.

The important part was there would be no internet. Forever. And I was rich, so I would also have a private plane which I fly drunk.

Read full topic

item.title: Rapture! For real!
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
You mean where only I would live?

I would kill everyone to be alone.

But there are too many.

Read full topic

item.title: Rapture! For real!
item.dc:creator: mattemuse
item.description:
If I had the money I would build an underwater city where only you and Medevaile lived.

There would be no internet access.

Read full topic

item.title: Rapture! For real!
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
I would totally build underwater cities if I had the money.

Read full topic

item.description:
And I hope you enjoy it.

Read full topic

item.title: Rapture! For real!
item.dc:creator: Medevilae
item.description:
JohnKiller118:

I honestly don’t have any interest in Bioshock 2. It just doesn’t strike me as a must play, as odd as that sounds.

It may have to do with the fact that I’m still flooded by games that I got for Christmas.

Meh, around Christmas I ran out of games I wanted… Probably another reason I want to play BS2 so bad.

Read full topic

item.description:
JohnKiller118:

Are they, by any chance, also developing Vita-Chambers?

Ah. I wanna play BioShock2 so bad… Good thing it comes out tomorrow.

item.title: Rapture! For real!
item.dc:creator: JohnKiller118
item.description:
Sounds epic.
Cue the crazy cult riots and corrupt leader that will send the place straight to hell.

I need to play again Bioshock.

Read full topic

item.title: Rapture! For real!
item.dc:creator: Wark
item.description:
Oh, I get it now! War, famine, disease and poverty don’t exist because of differing ideals and human nature or anything. We just haven’t decided they need to go. It’s so simple. We should have thought of that ages ago!

Read full topic

item.title: Rapture! For real!
item.dc:creator: Nerdinium
item.description:
meh , I reckon it’s a good idea but their organisation will probably go to hell eventually and the project would just die out , and besides - from the text it just sounds like an experiment and gathering of data through research ,so … even if it does work i doubt it will catch on …

Read full topic

item.title: Rapture! For real!
item.dc:creator: Medevilae
item.description:
Dillxn:

It sounds like a compound.

Anyone remember David Koresh and the Branch Davidians?

In a way- except, they want to reform the country, more or less the world to be like this… I say it’s ahead of it’s time.

I actually think a society like this someday is inevitable.

Read full topic

item.title: Rapture! For real!
item.dc:creator: Medevilae
item.description:
There’s a project I noticed while sifting through Google, about something that seems eerily similar to Rapture from the game Bio Shock… Will it fail? Succeed? Discuss. :retard:

The Venus Project:

The Venus Project is an organization that proposes a feasible plan of action for social change, one that works towards a peaceful and sustainable global civilization. It outlines an alternative to strive toward where human rights are no longer paper proclamations but a way of life.

We operate out of a 21.5-acre Research Center located in Venus, Florida.

When one considers the enormity of the challenges facing society today, we can safely conclude that the time is long overdue for us to reexamine our values, and to reflect upon and evaluate some of the underlying issues and assumptions we have as a society. This self-analysis calls into question the very nature of what it means to be human, what it means to be a member of a “civilization,” and what choices we can make today to ensure a prosperous future for all the world’s people.

Obviously it’s not under the ocean or anything, but the principles are… Familiar, to put it one way.

Read full topic
